content:
I'm not sure about the story behind the painting, as my grandmother passed away before I could ask her about it. But I do know it's been in storage for years, and I'd love to get it restored and displayed in my home. I've taken it to a local art conservation studio, and they said it would take about six weeks to complete the restoration. I'm really looking forward to seeing it once it's done.

By the way, I've also been collecting art books from thrift stores and garage sales, and I now have a shelf dedicated to art history and theory. It's become one of my favorite sections in my home library.
